meanings.definition: A type of marine worm known for its venomous spines.
meanings.sent1: The fireworms in the ocean have sharp spines for protection.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study fireworms to learn more about their venomous nature.
meanings.sent3: The fireworms decided to have a spiky fashion show in the sea.
meanings.sent4: Beware of the fireworms lurking in the depths, ready to sting like tiny needles.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium displayed a tank full of colorful fireworms, each with its own set of dangerous spines.
